reviews.author: Local Customer
reviews.text: Sehr leckere Rührei-Kreationen mit total flexiblem Service und freundlichem, zuvorkommendem Personal. Gemütlich, familienfreundlich mit köstlichem Essen!

reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: Great coffee and patient staff demonstrating high quality and terrific service. The cozy atmosphere makes it perfect for working or relaxing.

reviews.author: Berlin Foodie
reviews.text: Attractive prices and a nice, cozy atmosphere. Kid-friendly with a play area and changing table. Perfect neighborhood cafe!

reviews.author: Regular Visitor
reviews.text: Homemade cakes are absolutely delicious! The breakfast options are creative and the chai latte selection is impressive. Truly a Goldstück (gem) in Prenzlauer Berg.
